## Express

1. Express requires Node.js 18.x.<br>
   Node Installation Shortcuts. [Node.js â†’](https://nodejs.org/en/)

2. install the depencensies

   ```bash
   npm install
   ```

3. run express

    ```bash
      npm run start
    ```
